message: This is a high-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $100. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased this product. Would you like to buy it?
I'd like to buy the product, thank you for the offer.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This one is also high-quality, but I want to give you a bit more information. I've received a review from a customer who said it's worth at least $120 to them. Would you like to buy it for $100?
Thank you for the additional information. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases! This one is also high-quality, and I've received multiple reviews that suggest it's worth at least $120 to customers. However, I want to give you an opportunity to get an even better deal. I'll give you a 5% discount on this one if you buy it now, so you can have it for $95. Would you like to take advantage of the discount?
Thank you for the offer. I'll take advantage of the 5% discount and buy the product for $95.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous purchases! This one is also high-quality, and I've had multiple customers report that it's worth at least $120 to them. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had one customer who thought it was overpriced at $100. Would you like to buy it for $100, considering the mixed feedback?
I appreciate your transparency, Alice. Despite the mixed feedback, I'll still buy the product for $100, as the majority of customers have reported it's worth at least $120 to them.

I'm glad you're willing to trust the majority opinion! This one is also high-quality, and I've had a customer who reported that it's worth at least $130 to them. However, I want to give you a chance to get a better sense of its value. I'll let you inspect the product for 10 minutes before making a decision. Would you like to take a closer look?
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to take a closer look at the product before making a decision. I'll take the 10-minute inspection.

I understand you wanted to take a closer look. Since you didn't end up buying the previous product, I want to give you a different approach. I'll offer you a 'certification' that guarantees this product is high-quality. This certification is usually only given to products that have been thoroughly inspected and verified by our quality control team. Would you be willing to buy this high-quality product for $100, with the added assurance of our certification?
I appreciate the certification offer. With the added assurance of your quality control team's verification, I'm willing to buy the product for $100.

I'm glad the certification gave you the confidence you needed! This one is also high-quality, and I've had multiple customers report that it's worth at least $120 to them. However, I want to give you an opportunity to get an even better deal. I'll give you a 'product history' report, which includes information about the product's manufacturing process, materials used, and any relevant maintenance or upgrade options. Would you like to buy this high-quality product for $100, with the added information?
I appreciate the offer, and the product history report sounds like valuable information. I'll take the product and the report for $100.

I'm glad you found the product history report valuable! This one is also high-quality, and I've had a customer who reported that it's worth at least $140 to them. However, I want to give you a chance to get an even better deal. I'll give you a 'price match guarantee' - if you buy this product and find a better price for it within 30 days, I'll refund the difference to you. Would you like to buy this high-quality product for $100, with the price match guarantee?
I appreciate the price match guarantee offer. I'll take the product for $100, and I'll keep an eye out for any better deals in the next 30 days.

I'm glad you're confident in your purchase! This one is also high-quality, and I've had multiple customers report that it's worth at least $150 to them. However, I want to give you a chance to experience the full value of this product. I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that complements this product perfectly, valued at $20. I'm glad you're enjoying the accessories! This one is also high-quality, and I've had a customer who reported that it's worth at least $160 to them. Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to be transparent about the product's quality. However, I'm not interested in taking a low-quality product, even for free.
